meta.label: Enrich from Movies APIs
meta.description: Enrich datasets with data about movies (ratings, runlength, IMDb id...) from the Open Movie Database and The Movie DB
meta.author: Dataiku (Jean-Baptiste Rouquier)

params.name: tmdb_api_key
params.label: TMDb API key
